title: Calories in a Mini Snickers
meta_description: Learn calories in mini snickers: one bar has about 50 kcal, plus carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and sodium breakdown for smart snacking.
assumptions: Standard mini Snickers bar (~13 g), milk chocolate with nougat, caramel, and peanuts; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, size, and manufacturer; values based on average USDA/brand data. Check packaging for exact info.

quick_answer.text: One mini Snickers bar contains about 50 calories with 6 g carbs and 1 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Two mini bars instead of one
Frozen mini bar (no calorie change, but texture varies)

faqs.q: How many calories in one mini Snickers?
What are the carbs in mini Snickers?
faqs.a: 6 g total carbs, including 5 g sugars and 0.2 g fiber per bar.

faqs.q: Is protein high in mini Snickers?
faqs.a: Only 1 g protein per mini bar, mainly from peanuts.

faqs.q: How much sugar in a mini Snickers?
faqs.a: Approximately 5 g of sugars per bar.

faqs.q: Calories in mini Snickers vs. full-size?
faqs.a: Mini is 50 kcal; full-size (50 g) is about 250 kcal.
